  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2418</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The structure of Biological macromolecules</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Struktur der biologischen Makromoleküle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La structure des macromolécules biologiques</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A estrutura de macromolecules biológicos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La struttura delle macromolecole biologiche</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η δομή των βιολογικών μακρομορίων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La estructura de macromoléculas biológicas</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A tutorial which demostrates the structure of Biological macromolecules: Proteins, Carbohydrates, Lipids and Nucleic acids.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">macromolecules polymers</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Tutorial der demostrates die Struktur der 
biologischen Makromoleküle: Proteine, Kohlenhydrate, Lipide und
Nukleinsäuren.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un cours d'instruction qui demostrates la 
structure des macromolécules biologiques : Protéines, hydrates
de carbone, lipides et acides nucléiques.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um tutorial que demostrates a estrutura de 
macromolecules biológicos: Proteínas, hidratos de carbono, 
lipids e ácidos nucleic.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una lezione privata che demostrates la struttura 
delle macromolecole biologiche: Proteine, carboidrati, lipidi ed
acidi nucleici.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένας διδακτικός που demostrates η δομή των 
βιολογικών μακρομορίων: Πρωτεϊ'νες, υδατάνθρακες, λιπίδια 
και νουκλεϊνικά οξέα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una guía que demostrates la estructura de 
macromoléculas biológicas: Proteínas, carbohidratos, lípidos
y ácidos nucleic.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Makromolekülpolymer-Plastiken</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">polymères de macromolécules</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">polímeros dos macromolecules</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">polimeri delle macromolecole</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">πολυμερή σώματα μακρομορίων</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">polímeros de las macromoléculas</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
